1125476338733682689.text:
Excited to launch "Leverage / Save" CDP feature on our Banking Portal.

[Loop] Draw DAI >> Buy ETH >> Lock ETH.

[Save] Free ETH >> Buy DAI >> Wipe Debt.

All in one txn, interacts with @MakerDAO, @KyberNetwork, @UniswapExchange and makes your life easier.pic.twitter.com/sBo8caJGG2

+ Token Value ($)
+ CDP Collateral ($)
+ Uniswap Pools ($)
---
= TOTAL ASSETS ($)
- CDP Debt ($)
- CDP Fees ($)
---
= NET ASSETS ($)

1065140526180065280.text: It's pretty amazing to see how protocols interact with each other. Like swapping DAI-MKR on-chain via @KyberNetwork to pay fees while wiping the debt DAI in @MakerDAO CDP in single call without letting user know what's MKR. Our next launch includes simplified CDP portal.
